pastries.title: Butter Croissant
pastries.text: A freshly baked, crisp, and buttery croissant.

pastries.title: Pain Au Chocolat
pastries.text: A warm, buttery, and flaky pain au chocolat with rich chocolate that melts in your mouth.
pastries.imageAlt: An image of Pain Au Chocolat

pastries.title: Almond Croissant
pastries.text: A sweet, twice-baked pastry filled with a thick, nutty frangipane and topped with crunchy toasted almonds and powdered sugar.

pastries.title: Hazelnut Croissant
pastries.text: Hazelnut Croissant: A decadent, golden-brown treat featuring a roasted hazelnut cream filling that offers an earthy, praline-like sweetness in every bite.
pastries.imageAlt: An image of Pain Au Chocolat

pastries.title: Cinnamon Roll
pastries.text: A soft, gooey swirl of spiced dough packed with aromatic cinnamon and a deep, caramelized brown sugar glaze.

pastries.title: Vanilla Cr√®me Danish
pastries.text: A light, laminated pastry cradling a pool of silky-smooth custard that is infused with the floral and elegant notes of real vanilla.
pastries.imageAlt: An image of Pain Au Chocolat

pastries.title: Apple Turnover
pastries.text: A crisp, sugar-dusted puff pastry filled with tender, cinnamon-spiced apple chunks that have a bright, tart acidity.

pastries.title: Raspberry Danish
pastries.text: A buttery, flaky nest containing a vibrant, jammy raspberry center that pops with a refreshing and tangy fruit flavor.
pastries.imageAlt: An image of Pain Au Chocolat

pastries.title: Lemon Tartlet
pastries.text: A buttery shortbread crust filled with a punchy, velvety lemon curd that perfectly balances sharp citrus zing with a sweet finish.

pastries.title: Mini Quiche Lorraine
pastries.text: A savory, melt-in-your-mouth pastry crust filled with a smoky, peppery egg custard and the rich, salty depth of bacon and cheese.
pastries.imageAlt: An image of Pain Au Chocolat

cakes.title: Opera Cake
cakes.text: A rich blend of chocolate and coffee layered into pure happiness.

cakes.title: Chocolate Ganache Cake
cakes.text: An ultra-rich, velvety cake enrobed in a dense, glossy chocolate ganache that delivers a deep, bittersweet cocoa intensity in every bite.

cakes.title: Vanilla Cheesecake
cakes.text: A creamy, dense, and silky-smooth cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust and a clean, elegant punch of pure vanilla bean.

cakes.title: Lemon Meringue Cake
cakes.text: A bright and zesty cake layered with punchy lemon curd and topped with airy, toasted marshmallow-like meringue that melts on your tongue.

cakes.title: Carrot Cake
cakes.text: A moist, warmly spiced cake packed with grated carrots and toasted walnuts, smothered in a thick, tangy, and sweet cream cheese frosting.

cakes.title: Tiramisu Slice
cakes.text: A light and airy Italian classic made of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and whipped mascarpone cream, finished with a heavy dusting of bitter cocoa powder.

cakes.title: Red Velvet Cake
cakes.text: A strikingly crimson, soft-crumbed cake with a subtle hint of cocoa and a signature tang, perfectly complemented by a rich and velvety cream cheese icing.

coffees.title: Latte
coffees.text: A creamy, smooth, and comforting coffee to start your day right.

coffees.title: Espresso
coffees.text: A concentrated, bold, and intense shot of coffee with a syrupy texture and a golden layer of crema that packs a punch of roasted bitterness and acidity.

coffees.title: Americano
coffees.text: A smooth, robust, and diluted espresso drink that maintains a deep coffee flavor with a lighter body similar to a traditional black coffee.

coffees.title: Cappuccino
coffees.text: A perfectly balanced, airy, and creamy delight featuring equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and a thick, velvety head of dry milk foam.

coffees.title: Flat White
coffees.text: A strong, velvety, and micro-foam topped coffee that delivers a higher ratio of espresso to milk for a punchier flavor and a seamless, liquid-silk texture.

coffees.title: Mocha
coffees.text: A rich, indulgent, and chocolatey treat that blends espresso with steamed milk and a decadent cocoa syrup for a dessert-like coffee experience.

coffees.title: Caramel Latte
coffees.text: A sweet, buttery, and luxurious twist on the classic latte, infused with toasted caramel notes that linger on the palate.

coffees.title: Iced Latte
coffees.text: A refreshing, chilled, and milky espresso drink poured over ice that offers a crisp and clean caffeine kick perfect for a sunny afternoon.

beverages.title: Hot Chocolate
beverages.text: A rich, comforting, and deeply cocoa-heavy beverage made with steamed milk for a thick, hug-in-a-mug chocolate experience.

beverages.title: Peach Iced Tea
beverages.text: A smooth, chilled black tea infused with the floral sweetness of ripe peaches for a perfectly balanced and fruity thirst-quencher.

beverages.title: Mineral Water
beverages.text: A clean, crisp, and neutral palate cleanser that provides a refreshing hydration with a subtle, stony hint of natural minerals.

beverages.title: Matcha Latte
beverages.text: A vibrant, earthy, and velvety smooth green tea drink whisked with creamy milk for a unique balance of grassy notes and mellow sweetness.

beverages.title: Elderflower Sparkling Drink
beverages.text: A light, elegant, and sophisticated floral soda with delicate hints of lychee and pear that feels incredibly crisp and airy.

beverages.title: Apple Juice
beverages.text: A sweet, crisp, and nostalgic fruit juice that delivers the mellow, honeyed flavor of pressed orchard-fresh apples.

beverages.title: Fresh Orange Juice
beverages.text: A bright, zesty, and naturally sweet juice packed with pulp and a refreshing citrus tang that tastes like pure sunshine.

beverages.title: Sparkling Lemonade
beverages.text: A crisp, bubbly, and effervescent drink that balances sharp, puckering lemon acidity with a clean, sugary finish.
